data.text: Chani, nihochokholha tho wiishipa naashineneru? Ama niwiiheke iwarakha yo unichuwelhiha uwaninyu ama nithananeke iwarakha ukhuma uwaninyu thoko attu akina chineera aya?
Mwaattiva mwaashinene phi iwarakha ihu ilhepiye mmamirimani mwihu inochuwania ni ushomiya ni kila ntu.

Phi ikekhiaye wiira mwaattiva phi iwarakha ya Kuristo irwenhe awe wo iphiro yo mitheko chihu. Iwarakha inene iyo khilhepiye wo wino nansho wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku ri nkumi ihilhepiye vanlhuku nihemiye nansho mmamirimani mwa attu.
Ninoolhumacha yayo wo uhoova, wo nlhatu wo ukhulhuvelha urina ihu mmiholho wa Nlhuku wo chittu chaapangiye ni Kuristo.
Khiiwo inonooriha hii upanga ittu iriyoothe wo wooria wihu naashinene, nansho wooria wihu wonkhaye unokhuma wa Nlhuku.

Ukhalhawaya yoyo phi noorinhe uvara ntheko wo ukarumiya o Malhehano o Naanano ahirii malhehano o ikekhia ilhepiye, nansho malhehano o Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya ikekhiaye phi nommwiiha nookhwa nansho Iphumu ya Nlhuku phi nowiiha ukumi.

Paahi etu yakhalha malhove o ntheko unommwiiha nookhwa aalhepiye vachulhu vibau cho malhuku o uhemiya, ni uwa wo nthimicho wo waaria chinene, mpaka ata attu o Israeli nkayoocheelha uweha ikhove ya ashinna Musa, wo nlhatu wo waaria waya. Ukhalhawaya ikhove aya yaaria nthimicho wa Nlhuku, inakhalhaka wahowalhawalha wo uhipicha. Yakhalhaka etu malhehero anommwiiha nookhwa yaawiilhe wo nthimicho mwinchi thoko chiicho,
chani ntheko wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku khunkhalha ni nthimicho mulhupalhe chinene?
Yakhalhaka wahaawo nthimicho wo ntheko waawihilhe ihukumu, iri mwaari etu wiira ntheko wo ikekhia unowiiha ukumi unookhalha ni nthimicho mulhupalhe chinene.
Ukhalhawaya nthimicho waari khalhayi vawo ulhe wahomalha machiri aya, vano nthimicho mulhupalhe chinene uhokusha ntheko waya.
Ukhalhawaya yakhalhaka ilhe yo ikatema ikani ilhe yaari ni nthimicho waya, paahi etu we ikekhiaye iyo yo ulhokelha mahuku o uhimalha iyo inowa ukhalha yo nthimicho mulhupalhe chinene.
Ukhalhawaya ulha phi ukhulhuvelha wihu, paahi etu hiyaano ninoolhumacha wo uhoova ittu.
Hiyaano khanihii thoko ashinna Musa yeetiyelhenlhe ikitambaa wiitho wiira attu o Israeli ahoone nthimicho ulhe vaawalhawalha aya.
Nansho irusho chaya chahophupuwalhihiya. Ata lhelho vanoshomiya aya Malhehano o Khalhayi, yeyo itiyelhelho iyo inariwo. Itiyelhelho iyo inowa uthamihiya tu ntu vanohalha awe ulhutaana ni Kuristo.
Ata lhelho nna vanoshomiya aya Malhehero aavahiye aya ashinna Musa, mirima chaya chinokhalha chinatiyelhelhiye ni ikitambaa iyo.
Nansho ikatema ntu vanaahokolhelha awe Athithi Yesu, itiyelhelho iyo inoothamihiya.
Vaa “Athithi” phi Iphumu ya Nlhuku, ni vakittu varii Iphumu ya Athithi, vavawo phiri uneethi.

Paahi, hiyaano onkhaye nihitiyelhelhiye ikhove chihu, ninowooniha nthimicho wa Athithi thoko waaria wo vakiooni, ninoorukunushiya wiira nilhikaane ni ayo wo nthimicho mwinchi chinene unokhuma wa Athithi arii phi Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
